page.title: 08A Superstore.
page.content: Kwik-save is one of a chain of very cheap superstores, run to save as much money as possible. It offers a limited range of goods. It is situated at the entrance to the Wildwood estate with its own large free car park. You collect a trolley at the entrance. Goods for sale are displayed on shelves ,left in the boxes they came in. The prices are on the shelves, not on the individual items. Frozen food stored in chest freezers whose lids must be opened by the customer. You select the items you want and put them in your trolley. Then you go to a check-out. The cash registers are basic adding machines and the cashiers transfer your goods from one trolley to another.
